name: Picture Space Time (Desktop Version)
short_description:
Java desktop version of picturespacetime.com (now extinct).

Web version is available here at 

This allows you to add Time perception value to pictures using sound speed.
Speed is controlled using metronome in the application with milliseconds of gap as input.

Metronome speed value gets saved to a text file with "image_name",txt format as file name.

This can be used for photography and for remembering what speed our thinking was for photographs we remember taking or being in.

Thanks to users who made picturespacetime.com un-idle although they were very few.
summary: Allows you to add Time Perception value to pictures
